backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a leaderboard with submitScore and getLeaderboard functions, storing name-score pairs in a list and sorting by score descending.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features including game interface, tap validation logic, score display, leaderboard, and vibrant visual design with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with comprehensive design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'Colour Tap'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with gradient background, header with title, GameBoard in main section, footer with caffeine.ai attribution, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/ColorTile.tsx: Button component for game tiles with color prop, active/disabled states, hover/scale animations, and dynamic styling.
frontend/src/components/GameBoard.tsx: Main game container managing game state via useGameLogic hook, rendering 2x2 color tile grid, score display, controls, and toggleable leaderboard with GameOverModal.
frontend/src/components/GameOverModal.ts: Dialog modal displaying final score with trophy icon and form to submit player name to leaderboard using useSubmitScore mutation.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Card component displaying top 10 scores with medal icons for top 3, loading state, and error handling using useLeaderboard hook.
frontend/src/components/ScoreDisplay.tsx: Display component showing current score with trophy icon in a styled gradient container with large numeric display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, returning actor instance and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameLogic.ts: Custom React hook managing Simon-style memory game state including sequence generation, playback with tile flashing, player input validation, scoring, and game over detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Re-exports leaderboard query and score submission hooks from useQueries for simplified access to leaderboard functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching leaderboard data and submitting scores to the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on score submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors, typography, and CSS variables for a modern UI system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH, typography settings, animations, and plugins for a design system with light/dark mode support.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (game interface, logic, scoring, leaderboard, visual design) and pending feature requests (persistent backend storage) for a color tap memory game.
